scripts.postinstall: yarn-deduplicate && expo-yarn-workspaces check-workspace-dependencies && (test -d node_modules/react-native-reanimated/android/expo && patch -d node_modules -p2 -f < patches/react-native-reanimated+2.4.1.patch || true)
scripts.tsc: echo 'You are trying to run "tsc" in the workspace root. Run it from an individual package instead.' && exit 1
